document_data.name: Thorl beldarakul
document_data.mainbody: '''Thorl beldarakul''', a [[dwarvish]] name that translated into [[Common]] as "Old Trickster," was a variety of [[dwarf|Dwarven]] alcohol.
document_data.Description: This alcohol had a glowing, amber hue to it.

Notable Users.Businesses: * The [[Jade Dancer]], a festhall and tavern in the city of [[Waterdeep]], sold this alcohol at a price of 5 [[silver piece]]s for a tallglass and 1 [[gold piece]] for a flagon.
